title: CSS Change Variables With JavaScript

metadata.description: Learn about CSS Change Variables With JavaScript with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example
content_sections.code:
<script>
// Get the root element
var r = document.querySelector(':root');
// Create a function for getting a variable value
function 
  myFunction_get() {
// Get the styles (properties and values) for the 
  root
var rs = getComputedStyle(r);
// Alert the value of 
  the --blue variable
alert("The value of --blue is: " + 
  rs.getPropertyValue('--blue'));
}
// Create a function for setting a 
  variable value
function myFunction_set() {
// Set the value of 
  variable --blue to another value (in this case "lightblue")
r.style.setProperty('--blue', 'lightblue');
}
</script>
